product_highlights: Skin Microbiome Platform - Advanced skin microbiota models for skin care applications
Health & Nutrition Expertise - Microbiome science transferred from health and animal nutrition to skincare
Scientific Research - Deep understanding of microbiome interactions and mechanisms
notes: Major cosmetic ingredient supplier bringing advanced microbiome science from health and animal nutrition sectors to skincare applications. Offers sophisticated skin microbiota models and deep scientific understanding of microbiome interactions. Evonik's expertise in nutrition and health provides unique insights into beneficial bacteria cultivation and skin ecosystem balance.
